API_Description: Returns the index of a page given its page object number.
API_Description_Reason: The method name suggests it retrieves the page index using the page object number, which is a common way to reference pages in PDF documents.
Returns: The 0-based index of the page corresponding to the given page object number.
Returns_Reason: The method is expected to return an index, which is typically a number, representing the position of the page in the document.

nPageObjNum.description: The object number of the page whose index is to be retrieved.
nPageObjNum.description_reason: The method name implies that it requires a page object number to find the corresponding page index.
nPageObjNum.type_reason: Page object numbers are typically represented as numbers in PDF structures.
